data.title: George Zebrowski, Ian Watson
data.meta_description: Norwalk, Connecticut: Easton Press, 1990. Collector's Edition. Full Leather. 24.5 x 15.5 cm. Octavo. 284 pages. Brown leather. Gilt design to cover and spine. Gilt foredges. Signed by the author, George Zebrowski, on the limitation page. The limitation page only is wavy. Laid in collector's notes. Near Fine. Item #53348 Part of the Masterpieces of Science Fiction collection.
data.text:
Macrolife.

Norwalk, Connecticut: Easton Press, 1990. Collector's Edition. Full Leather. 24.5 x 15.5 cm. Octavo. 284 pages. Brown leather. Gilt design to cover and spine. Gilt foredges. Signed by the author, George Zebrowski, on the limitation page. The limitation page only is wavy. Laid in collector's notes. Near Fine. Item #53348

Part of the Masterpieces of Science Fiction collection.
